mapper.sql: select oa_task_id, dept_id, task_name, status, important_level, difficult_level, start_date, end_date, is_team, source_type, sponsor_id, executor_id, appraiser_id, content, file, progress, expired_day, over_reason, detail from oa_task
mapper.select: SELECT su.user_name, d.dept_name, r.create_time AS reply_create_time, r.hours, r.content AS reply_content, IFNULL(r.progress, 0) AS reply_progress, t.oa_task_id, t.dept_id, t.task_name, t.status, t.important_level, t.difficult_level, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.is_team, t.source_type, t.sponsor_id, t.executor_id, t.appraiser_id, t.content, t.file, t.progress, t.expired_day, t.over_reason, t.detail FROM oa_task t INNER JOIN oa_task_reply r ON t.oa_task_id = r.task_id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON r.user_id = su.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON t.dept_id=d.dept_id WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND su.del_flag = 0 AND d.del_flag = 0 AND t.oa_task_id = #{oaTaskId} ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(r.progress),0) as progress, t.oa_task_id, t.sponsor_id FROM oa_task t INNER JOIN oa_task_reply r ON t.oa_task_id=r.task_id WHERE t.oa_task_id = #{oaTaskId}

select t.oa_task_id, t.dept_id, t.task_name, t.status, t.important_level, t.difficult_level, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.is_team, u.user_name, t.source_type, t.sponsor_id, t.executor_id, t.appraiser_id, t.content, t.file, t.progress, t.expired_day, t.over_reason, t.create_time, t.detail, d.dept_name from oa_task t INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON t.dept_id=d.dept_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON t.sponsor_id=u.user_id where t.oa_task_id = #{oaTaskId} AND t.del_flag=0 AND d.del_flag=0 AND u.del_flag=0
